snippet: This week, Starbucks joined forces with Square, a technology start-up that lets you pay for things with a smartphone. But even though the partnership is a powerful endorsement for mobile payments, it is far from certain that your phone will replace...
abstract: This week, Starbucks joined forces with Square, a technology start-up that lets you pay for things with a smartphone. But even though the partnership is a powerful endorsement for mobile payments, it is far from certain that your phone will replace your wallet anytime soon, reports Brian X. Chen in Friday's New York Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: The Campaign for Mobile Payments Intensifies
